posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: March 18, 2016 at 9:25 PM#2there is no dedicated keyword for "next free" numberthis approch however works in many cases:e.g.1CodeStore Preset 1."unique_non-existing_name"Label Preset 1."unique_non-existing_name" "any_new_name"e.g.2CodeStore Executor "unique_non-existing_name"Label Executor "unique_non-existing_name" "any_new_name"
